law.catch_line: When an authority is organized and elects its initial officers, the secretary of the authority shall...

text.section:
When an authority is organized and elects its initial officers, the secretary of the authority shall file for record with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation:
The name and address of each officer of the authority; and
The location of the principal office of the authority.

Within 10 days after any change in location of the principal office of the authority, the secretary of the authority shall file notice of the new location with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation.
